mapper.update: update question set question_content = #{questionContent} where question_id = #{questionId}
mapper.insert: insert into user_answer_question(user_id, study_id, question_id, question_answer) values (#{userId}, #{studyId}, #{questionId}, #{questionAnswer})
mapper.select: select q.study_id studyId, q.question_id questionId, q.question_content questionContent, uaq.question_answer questionAnswer from question q left join user_answer_question uaq on q.question_id = uaq.question_id where q.study_id = #{studyId} and uaq.user_id = #{userId};
